rows.label: bf02100100_0010
rows.name: Wow, what an incredibly vast plain!

rows.label: bf02100100_0030
rows.name:
Yeah, this is great! Especially after slumming it
on Gramps's back for so long!

rows.label: bf02100100_0040
rows.name: Hmph! That last comment was unnecessary!

rows.label: bf02100100_0050
rows.name:
That you can see over there is Torigo, 
the biggest city in Gula.

rows.label: bf02100100_0060
rows.name:
I'll accompany you as far as the city.
After that, I'm afraid you're on your own.

rows.label: bf02100100_0080
rows.name:
What do you mean why? I can't be 
together with you guys, you know.

rows.label: bf02100100_0090
rows.name: Is it because of what happened with them?

rows.label: bf02100100_0100
rows.name:
Even though we haven't known each other long, 
they're still my comrades, you know.

rows.label: bf02100100_0110
rows.name:
They're your comrades? 
Even though they tried to kill you, Nia?

rows.label: bf02100100_0120
rows.name: Even so... that's the only place I belong...
